commitMessage:
@@@Fix H2 metrics read bug.  can't read expected existing metrics. (#3132)

Make agent mock works as usual.

@@@[BugFix] Fix wrong H2 column type (#4593)

MEDIUMTEXT in H2 is CLOB in JDBC type.  and casting it to `String` causes `ClassCastException`
@@@Support multiple implementations of StorageBuilder in different storage implementations - stage 1. (#6334)
